channel.title: Homes on Ye Myat Kaung (Maverick)
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Ye Myat Kaung (Maverick)

item.title: about
item.description:
Biography

Ye Myat Kaung (more commonly known as Maverick) is a highly motivated and passionate free and open source software (FOSS) advocate. He is interested in software development, computer system administration and management, digital security and data privacy. He is also an aspiring ethical hacker and software engineer.

His passion includes diving into highly technical topics and then helping users understand those highly technical topics by giving bite-sized digestable examples. He is also very passionate about continuity of knowledge through sharing and teaching.
